text: Clarissa Theresa Philomena Aileen Mary Josephine Agnes Elsie Trilby Louise Esmerelda Dickson Wright (24 June 1947 - 15 March 2014) was an English celebrity chef, television personality, businesswoman and barrister. She was best known as one half, along with the late Jennifer Paterson, of BBC Two's Two Fat Ladies (1996-99). She was born in St John's Wood, London. She was a Roman Catholic. Dickson Wright died on 15 March 2014 in Edinburgh, Scotland, having been in hospital for several weeks. She was 66 years old. She was outlived by her two sisters. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:British chefs Category:English barristers Category:Businesspeople from London Category:Disease-related deaths in Scotland Category:English Roman Catholics Category:Television personalities from London Category:Writers from London
title: Clarissa Dickson Wright
